meanings.definition: A symbol (#) used to indicate a number or pound weight.
meanings.sent1: I saw many octothorps on the sign, showing the prices of items.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for two octothorps of sugar.
meanings.sent3: The octothorps on the scale seemed to be having a weightlifting competition.
meanings.sent4: The octothorps on the page were like little sharp musical notes.
meanings.sent5: The octothorps on the ruler made it easy to measure in pounds.

meanings.definition: A symbol (#) used in social media to tag topics or keywords.
meanings.sent1: She added several octothorps to her post to make it easier to find.
meanings.sent2: The octothorps helped organize the tweets into different categories.
meanings.sent3: The octothorps at the party were busy tagging everything in sight.
meanings.sent4: The octothorps in the online world were like little searchlights.
meanings.sent5: The octothorps on the screen guided users to relevant content.

meanings.definition: A symbol (#) used in telephony to indicate a button on a telephone keypad.
meanings.sent1: Press the octothorps to connect the call.
meanings.sent2: The octothorps on the phone keypad were worn from frequent use.
meanings.sent3: The octothorps on the phone seemed to be having a conversation of their own.
meanings.sent4: The octothorps on the keypad were like little communication portals.
meanings.sent5: The octothorps on the phone were essential for dialing numbers quickly.
